power.title: Battle Awareness
power.fluff: You can sense danger before the threat is fully realized

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You roll initiative and dislike the result

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +10 bonus to the triggering initiative check.

power.title: Bewitching Glare
power.fluff: You catch your enemy's eye just as the foe makes an attack, and what it sees in your gaze rattles it enough to interfere with its strike

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must be eladrin.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy in the burst makes an attack roll against an ally you can see

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes a -2 penalty to the triggering attack roll.
If the triggering attack misses, you can pull the target 1 square, or 2 squares if it is marked by you.

power.title: Bodyguard's Readyness
power.fluff: You stand poised, ready to block attacks made against your allies with your shield, weapon, or failing all other options, with your body

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Bodyguard's Readyness stance.
Until the stance ends, you can use the following action at-will, and must use it it every time you are able to, or the stance immediately ends:

section.name: Free Interrupt:
section.text: Trigger: An ally adjacent to you takes damage; You reduce the damage by 5, then take damage equal to the reduction. You cannot reduce or avoid the damage you take.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Reduce by 10.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Reduce by 15.

power.title: Dauntless Endurance
power.fluff: You easily shake off a debilitating effect that would cripple another warrior

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Endurance.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You make a saving throw and dislike the result

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You reroll the triggering saving throw, but must use the second result.

power.title: Defensive Training
power.fluff: With a soldier's discipline, you steel yourself against attacks that would overcome a lesser person

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Defensive Training stance.
Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will

power.title: Get Up!
power.fluff: The aid you provide gets a dying ally back on his or her feet

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have training in Heal.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One dying ally adjacent to you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value, and then stand up from prone.
